text: I prochitay im rasskaz pro Nukha. Vot skazal on svoyemu narodu: "O narod moy! Yesli tyazhko dlya vas moye prebyvaniye i napominaniye o znameniyakh Allakha, to na Allakha ya polagayus'; ob"yedinite zhe vashe delo i vashikh sotovarishchey, potom pust' vashe delo vas ne zabotit, potom sudite menya, ne davayte mne otsrochki
